## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5ef3fd9f7c979ad17316b55bd4b33311a8afc4966f82955133c709fef2b53e84)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'icare' @ 1.0.0 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
